entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. John's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:20 AM NST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -15.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. John's Int'l Airport 06:16 AM NST Monday 27 February 2023
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: -15.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -26
Dewpoint: -19.4°C
Wind: NW 25 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 23. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14 except minus 20 inland. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 14 except minus 20 inland. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 27 February 2023
